originalText.text: Rooms were clean. Some staff was helpful and some check-in staff in the lobby definitely had attitudes when asking questions as a first time visitor. Overall clean bathrooms and facility 4/5.

text.text: Rooms were clean. Some staff was helpful and some check-in staff in the lobby definitely had attitudes when asking questions as a first time visitor. Overall clean bathrooms and facility 4/5.

originalText.text: Immense gratitude for the exceptional care and support that you provided to my beloved grandpa during his stay at your hospital. The compassion, professionalism, and dedication displayed by your entire team have left a profound impact on our family.

originalText.text: I have a family member there who is having the same issue many of us are writing about. The staff does not car. Starting with ,when you first walk in. They can't get the visiting hours correct.   My family member  was choking. Unable to breath because the tube was dirty. ,they leaving them dirty, why hasn't the heath department take away the license  to operate that place or have the federal government take over the operation

originalText.text: My uncle was there for a month and a half  he was doing good in the hospital until he was moved to this place I called weeks in and out with not one answering the phone and when I got a hold of someone there didn't have any information for me and his wife my uncle  Complain to me of being mistreated was stuck in the bed all day not moved at all he was very depressed. Because of the lack of work. My uncle has now passed away I will forever hold the nursing home responsible for my uncle's death
